articles.title: Maruti Suzuki Increases Prices Of Select Models By 1.6% From April 2021 - carandbike
articles.description: Maruti Suzuki has stated that the price hike is mainly due to an increase in various input costs, and the revised prices will be effective from today, April 16, 2021, onwards.

articles.title: Airtel emerged stronger from several 'near death experiences' including Jio entry: Sunil Mittal - ETTelecom.com
articles.description: “We have gone through, I would say several near-death experiences…We have now arrived today, after three or four big crises into a very healthy shape,” Mittal said at the Amazon Sambhav Summit 2021 on Thursday.
